text: Cornelis August Wilhelm Hirschman (16 February 1877 â€“ 26 June 1951), known as Carl Anton Wilhelm Hirschman,History of FIFA - Foundation on fifa.com, retrieved 14 January 2017 was a Dutch banker. He was a co-founder of FIFA in 1904 and the 2nd General Secretary of FIFA from 1906 to 1931. In 1912 he was also one of the founders of the Dutch Olympic Committee (NOC).History of FIFA - More associations follow at fifa.com He was the acting President of FIFA from 1918 to 1921. ==References== Category:1877 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Dutch bankers Category:Dutch sportspeople Category:Presidents of FIFA
title: Cornelis August Wilhelm Hirschman
